author: Timothy B. Lee
title: Report: Apple’s Chinese contractors cut hours as iPhone demand falls
description: One analyst expects iPhone sales to fall 36 percent in the current quarter.
content:
Enlarge/ A man stands in front of a closed Apple Store in Tokyo.
0 with 0 posters participating
Chinese companies that manufacture iPhones for Apple are cutting back hours and have laid off some workers, the Financial Times reports.
